description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=1/3. Use the power of Old Spice to create perfect pickup lines and win over the ladies.  Select one of four Old Spice scents to take with you into battle.  Use the word spinner to fill in the blanks for each pickup line.  The ladies will respond to your success… or failure.  Correct words will boost your Old Spice power.  When your power is full you may unleash the full potential of Old Spice.
